---
title: EUROCONTROL Area
slug: eurocontrol-area
---

The EUROCONTROL area consists of the [42 EUROCONTROL Member States][ectl_ms].

In 2016, EUROCONTROL signed a [Comprehensive Agreement][ca] with Israel and Morocco with a view to fully integrate both States into its working structures. Where available, data for those two States have been included in the analyses  on this portal.
